* Vendor # 3rd party code that doesn't use CocoaPods
  * METCalendarViewer
  * LZOPhotoViewer

* Library # Anything that falls outside of the MVC pattern
  * Categories
  * Custom Containers
  * Base Classes
  * Utils
  
* AppDelegate

* Recipes
  * Views
  * Controllers
  * Networking

* Ingredients
  * Views
  * Controllers
  * Networking

* Comments
  * Views
  * Controllers
  * Networking

* Models # Usually generated by Mogenerator

* Images
